2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Struggle is the father of all things. It is not by the principles of humanity that man lives or is able to preserve himself above the animal world, but solely by means of the most brutal struggle.

1565107716_152fY68b7kM9nj4ErMRzbP64dVtj2.body:
Don't be fat, lift, be clean, brush your teeth, smell good but don't overdo the aftershave.
Then go to church.

1565237461_1LdgxNSynzpd5Vyi3Ej12adEuWbo1.body: They put 2.5 million Germans in pens and starved 10's of thousands of them to death at the end of the war. Seems more efficient than building gas chambers, chemical factories for zyklon (was really used for the typhus epidemic) gassing them, moving all the bodies, burying them, digging them up then burning them will coal, while at war with dozens of countries.
